::Slayer::

Slayer nods, walking up to a comp and initializing a search of the 
Trainer weapon database for the weapon that the Trainers had used to 
convert bots. He looks back at Ignatius.

"They wouldn't terminate Prebon, but they might not know who he is. 
They might try to reprogram him."

He looks back as the computer beeps, watching weapon stats come up on 
screen. The weapon he had been looking for had been found. Even 
though Slayer didn't know it, it was the weapon that had been used to 
convert Spears to a Trainer. It shot chips that stunned the bot and 
then gradually reprogrammed him into Prebon's slave.

"I think this is what we'll need," Slayer says, reading the 
specs, "It was originally meant to be used by a gestalt, but I think 
we can modify it to be carried by two bots. I doubt the technology 
involved can be shrunk small enough for one bot to carry it."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius was hurt but his internal repairs were compensating 
nicely. "I'll
> be fine, what do you need me to do?" he stared at the transmetal 
bot, almost
> amazed on how strong he was. "I'd bet that Prebons still alive, no 
faction
> would destroy such a high level hostage."
